items.sentence: Tom was in such a hurry that he left his umbrella behind on the train.

As crazy as it seems, dwarf stars can be 20 times bigger than our sun.
I'm not getting married this year. In fact, I might never get married.
Mary sat by the edge of the pool, her bare legs dangling in the water.
We spent all that night and the following day and night in the cellar.
Having missed the train, I had to wait about an hour for the next one.
I've seen that happen so many times that it doesn't bother me anymore.
Tom and Mary are up in their bedrooms, putting on their bathing suits.
